topic.title: <ColorDialog>
topic.p: <ColorDialog/> displays a OS native color dialog.

topic.title: Input / Output Properties
topic.p: Set these properties before calling ShowDialog to create a default user input. These properties will be changed after calling ShowDialog if the user change the default input.

topic.title: SelectedColor
topic.p: This property defines the selected color. If ShowDialog returns false, the value of this property is undefined.

topic.title: Input Properties
topic.p: Set these properties before calling ShowDialog to define the content of the dialog.

topic.title: EnabledCustomColor
topic.p: Set this property to true to enable an extended area, allowing the user to choose a color that is not in the predefined color list.

topic.title: OpenedCustomColor
topic.p: Set this property to true to display the custom color area by default. Otherwise the area is collapsed, but the user could still open it in the dialog.

topic.title: ShowDialog Method
topic.p: Call this function to display a dialog, and return true if a color is selected.

topic.title: Output Properties
topic.p: Read these properties after calling ShowDialog for user input.

topic.title: CustomColors
topic.p: This property returns all colors in the custom color area.
